body_html:
Resource inputs force everything to run on the correct device. We can rule this out by running the code with tf.ConfigProto(log_device_placement=True) to see where the ops are executing.

I do not understand though how changing the batch size can affect whether resources are present or not.

I've enabled allow_soft_placement, and the problem only occurs when colocate_gradients_with_ops=True in gradients computation. So I guess this colocation option breaks some ops' placement?
